metadata.title: Precise Accounting | Accuracy. Integrity. Results.
metadata.description: Precise Accounting - Where numbers meet clarity. Professional accounting services with care, precision, and transparency.

home.heroText1: Welcome to Precise Accounting, a place where numbers meet clarity and where the job is done with care, precision, and full transparency.
home.heroText2: We take care of the numbers so you can focus on what matters most: your family and your business.
home.ownerBio1: I bring over a decade of experience in finance and accounting, supported by a Master's degree in Mathematics and Statistics, giving me a strong analytical edge in everything I do.
home.ownerBio2: My career began in Russia as a bank economist, analyzing businesses for lending and investment decisions, a role that shaped my analytical approach and attention to detail. After moving to the U.S., I continued my work as an accountant in the trucking industry, one of the most complex areas of small business finance. This blend of financial analysis and U.S. accounting experience allows me to offer a deeper, more comprehensive understanding of each client's financial situation.
home.ownerBio3: I'm also an IRS Annual Filing Season Program (AFSP) credentialed tax professional, committed to continuous learning and staying fully up to date with the changing tax landscape. Every recommendation I make is rooted in legal, compliant, and ethical tax-reduction strategies.
home.aboutText1: At our firm precision meets personalized service. We believe that accounting should feel clear, supportive, and empowering - not overwhelming.
home.aboutText2: We take the time to understand your unique situation so we can provide accurate work, honest guidance, and tax strategies that are fully compliant and tailored to your goals.

location.title: Where do you live?
location.label: State of Residence

location.errorUnavailable: Sorry - we can’t generate an estimate for this state at this time.

income.title: Income & Situations
income.subtitle: Check all that apply to your situation:

options.selfEmployed: Self-employment / contractor income (1099-NEC) +$50 to the Base
options.rental: Rental property income +$50 to the Base
options.investment: Investment income (stocks, dividends, etc.) +$50 to the Base
options.crypto: Crypto transactions (you received, sold, exchanged a digital asset) +$50 to the Base
options.retirement: Retirement income (Social Security, pensions, 1099-R) +$30 to the Base
options.foreign: Foreign source of income +$100 to the Base
options.depreciation: Depreciation of vehicles/equipment +$50 to the Base

review.title: Your Estimate
review.disclaimer: The amount above represents an approximate estimate only; final fees will be determined once we complete a comprehensive review.
review.success: Request Sent! We've received your estimate request and will be in touch shortly.
review.name: Name
review.error: Failed to send. Please try again.
review.depositInfo: To reserve your spot and start the process, we require a $200 initial deposit. This amount will be credited towards your final fee.

consultation.title: Consultation Booking
consultation.reviewTerms: Please review and accept the terms below to proceed to booking.
consultation.bookingConfirm: Booking confirms that you have reviewed and agreed to these terms.
consultation.scopeText: A paid consultation provides professional guidance and answers to your questions related to tax matters, bookkeeping, and general tax optimization strategies. Advice is based solely on the information you provide and limited to the time scheduled.
excludeList: Preparation or filing of tax returns.
Legal, investment, financial planning, or securities advisory services.
consultation.additionalServices: If additional services are needed, they will be offered separately under a new engagement and pricing.
consultation.optText1: Precise Accounting LLC may provide tax optimization and tax planning recommendations to help legally minimize taxes and maximize tax-advantaged opportunities. These services are limited to the tax implications of financial decisions.
consultation.optText2: We do not provide investment advice, recommend or manage specific securities, evaluate investment performance, or provide returns-based strategies. Clients should consult a licensed investment advisor for investment or wealth-management guidance.
consultation.feeText: Payment is required in full prior to the consultation and covers professional time and expertise only. It is not a prepayment for tax preparation or future services. Fees are not dependent on tax outcomes, refunds, credits, or savings.
cancelList: Rescheduling 24+ hours in advance: no fee.
Cancellations less than 24 hours prior: non-refundable.
If we must reschedule for any reason, you may choose a new time or receive a 100% refund.
consultation.noRefund: After the consultation has occurred and time has been provided, no refunds are available.
consultation.respText: You agree to provide accurate and complete information and to independently evaluate all guidance received. Decisions and actions you take based on the consultation are your responsibility.
consultation.agreeTerms: I have read and agree to the Consultation Engagement Terms.

servicesPage.title: Our Services
servicesPage.subtitle: Comprehensive financial solutions tailored to your needs.
servicesPage.personalTaxDesc1: Every tax return is prepared with accuracy, thorough documentation, and good-faith interpretation of tax law.
servicesPage.personalTaxDesc2: Our goal is to help you stay fully compliant while uncovering every opportunity to maximize your refund or reduce your tax burden legally. You'll always know exactly where you stand, and you'll never feel alone in the process.
servicesPage.personalTaxDesc3: At Precise Accounting, we follow the highest standards of professional ethics, confidentiality, and compliance required by the IRS, and U.S. Treasury Department. Your information is safe. Your rights are protected.
servicesPage.businessTaxDesc: We offer hands-on, detail-driven business tax preparation for corporations, partnerships, and self-employed, giving you the support of a trusted professional.
servicesPage.booksReinstatementDesc: Restore clarity and confidence in your financials. We clean up and reinstate neglected or outdated books, ensuring full readiness for tax season, lender evaluations, or audit requirements, so your business is always prepared and protected.
servicesPage.estimatedTaxDesc: The IRS requires self-employed taxpayers and business owners to pay taxes quarterly. Falling behind can result in penalties. We determine accurate quarterly amounts for you and guide you through the schedule.
servicesPage.taxOptDesc: When tax season arrives, there are usually only a few limited things we can still do to legally reduce your tax liability. Effective tax strategy is built on proactive planning, not last-minute fixes. That applies to both personal and business taxes. Take action now, while the options are open and the impact is meaningful.
servicesPage.accountingDesc1: Professional bookkeeping and financial reporting, delivered at a predictable and simple monthly cost so you don't need to hire a full-time employee.
servicesPage.accountingDesc2: Accurate books are the foundation of any successful business. When your financials are current and organized, you can confidently make decisions, apply for loans, plan for taxes, and measure profitability.
servicesPage.accountingDesc3: We manage your books with the same level of detail and care as if they were our own. Every transaction is categorized correctly, every account reconciled, and every report delivered on schedule—giving you full visibility into your business performance without the burden of doing it yourself.
servicesPage.payrollSetupDesc: We take care of the entire process for you, from setup to ongoing maintenance, making sure everything is accurate, compliant, and reported correctly. Pricing varies based on employees, frequency, multi-state needs, benefits, and compliance requirements.
servicesPage.form1099Desc: Fast, accurate 1099 filing for your contractors, including preparation, IRS submission, and recipient copies.
servicesPage.salesTaxDesc: Accurate multi-state sales tax calculation, filing, and compliance.
servicesPage.newBusinessDesc: We help you choose the right structure, file the required documents, and set up your business properly.

accountingBookkeepingPage.title: Accounting & Bookkeeping
accountingBookkeepingPage.subtitle: Professional bookkeeping and financial reporting.
accountingBookkeepingPage.text1: Professional bookkeeping and financial reporting, delivered at a predictable and simple monthly cost so you don’t need to hire a full-time employee.
accountingBookkeepingPage.text2: Ready to hand off your bookkeeping with confidence?
accountingBookkeepingPage.estimateDisclaimer: *Before you begin: the quote shown will be an estimated amount, not a final price. We’ll confirm the exact fee after a detailed review of your documents, your situation and complexity.
accountingBookkeepingPage.text3: Accurate books are the foundation of any successful business. When your financials are current and organized, you can confidently make decisions, apply for loans, plan for taxes, and measure profitability.
accountingBookkeepingPage.text4: We manage your books with the same level of detail and care as if they were our own. Every transaction is categorized correctly, every account reconciled, and every report delivered on schedule—giving you full visibility into your business performance without the burden of doing it yourself.

cards.catDesc: Every transaction coded correctly for reliable reporting.
cards.reconDesc: Monthly reconciliation of bank, credit, and merchant accounts.
cards.reportsDesc: Timely financial statements for informed decision‑making.
cards.reviewsDesc: Periodic analysis to prepare for taxes and growth.

hiw.title: How It Works
hiw.step1Desc: Connect accounts and define categorization rules.
hiw.step2Desc: Update books weekly or monthly with reconciliations.
hiw.step3Desc: Deliver statements and insights on a predictable schedule.
hiw.step4Desc: Discuss performance and plan for the next quarter.

booksReinstatementPage.title: Books & Financial Records Reinstatement
booksReinstatementPage.subtitle: Get your financials back on track.
booksReinstatementPage.text1: Restore clarity and confidence in your financials. We clean up and reinstate neglected or outdated books, ensuring full readiness for tax season, lender evaluations, or audit requirements, so your business is always prepared and protected.
booksReinstatementPage.text2: Ready to get your financial records back on track?
booksReinstatementPage.text3: Falling behind on books happens, especially when a business is growing fast. But inaccurate financials can lead to IRS issues, cash-flow problems, denied funding, and costly tax amendments.
booksReinstatementPage.text4: We step in and restore full accuracy: missing records re-created, errors corrected, accounts aligned, and everything prepared to meet tax or audit standards. You’ll walk away with clean, organized books and a renewed sense of control over your business.

cards.historicalDesc: Rebuild missing transactions and statements for prior periods.
cards.errorDesc: Fix misclassifications and resolve discrepancies across accounts.
cards.reconDesc: Align bank, credit, and merchant accounts to the ledger.
cards.reportingDesc: Prepare accurate financials for tax filing and lender reviews.

hiw.step1Desc: Assess current books and define reinstatement scope.
hiw.step2Desc: Rebuild missing records and correct inaccuracies.
hiw.step3Desc: Align all accounts and verify balances are complete.
hiw.step4Desc: Deliver clean statements ready for tax and compliance.

estimatedTaxPage.title: Estimated Tax
estimatedTaxPage.subtitle: Stay ahead of your tax obligations.
estimatedTaxPage.text1: The IRS requires self-employed taxpayers and business owners to pay taxes quarterly. Falling behind can result in penalties. We determine accurate quarterly amounts for you and guide you through the schedule, ensuring you stay compliant and avoid surprise bills.
estimatedTaxPage.text2: Quarterly taxes can be confusing, especially when income fluctuates. Instead of guessing and risking penalties, we calculate precise payment amounts based on your income trends, business projections, and tax law changes.
estimatedTaxPage.text3: We help you plan your cash flow through the year, avoid unwanted IRS letters, and stay ahead of deadlines. With us, estimated taxes become predictable and manageable, helping you feel prepared instead of stressed.
estimatedTaxPage.text4: We calculate and file estimated tax payments for freelancers, real estate investors, gig-workers, self-employed individuals and business owners making sure you're always ahead of deadlines.

cards.calcDesc: Determine precise amounts using projections and safe‑harbor rules.
cards.cashflowDesc: Plan payments to minimize cash strain throughout the year.
cards.trackingDesc: Stay ahead of IRS dates and avoid penalties and surprises.
cards.schedulingDesc: Coordinate payment submissions and confirmations on time.

hiw.step1Desc: Analyze income trends and compute quarterly obligations.
hiw.step2Desc: Plan payments aligned to your cash‑flow cycles.
hiw.step3Desc: Review changes and adjust projections when needed.
hiw.step4Desc: Submit payments and confirm with documentation.

taxOptimizationPage.title: Tax Optimization & Planning
taxOptimizationPage.subtitle: Proactive strategies to legally minimize your tax liability.
taxOptimizationPage.text1: When tax season arrives, there are usually only a few limited things we can still do to legally reduce your tax liability. Effective tax strategy is built on proactive planning, not last-minute fixes. That applies to both personal and business taxes.
taxOptimizationPage.text2: We work with you throughout the year to identify deductions, credits, and strategies that fit your specific financial situation. Take action now, while the options are open and the impact is meaningful.
taxOptimizationPage.text3: A great tax result doesn’t happen once a year, it’s the product of decisions made all year long. We review how your personal and business finances interact and create a strategy tailored to your goals: retirement savings, childcare costs, real estate, legal structure, and more.
taxOptimizationPage.text4: We identify where opportunities exist, and show you how to take action before deadlines close the door. The earlier we start planning, the more you save and the stronger your long-term financial picture becomes.

cards.planningDesc: Structure decisions across the year for optimal results.
cards.entityDesc: Match legal structure to tax and growth objectives.
cards.retirementDesc: Leverage accounts and credits to build long‑term wealth.
cards.creditsDesc: Identify and capture opportunities specific to your situation.

hiw.step1Desc: Review income, expenses, and entity implications.
hiw.step2Desc: Create a tailored strategy with timelines and actions.
hiw.step3Desc: Execute changes and monitor for compliance.
hiw.step4Desc: Assess outcomes and refine for the next period.

payrollPage.title: Payroll Setup & Maintenance
payrollPage.subtitle: Accurate, compliant, and stress-free payroll solutions.
payrollPage.intro: We offer transparent, flexible payroll services designed for small businesses. We take care of the entire process for you, from setup to ongoing maintenance, making sure everything is accurate, compliant, and reported correctly.
payrollPage.setupDesc: This one-time fee covers everything needed to get payroll running correctly, including software configuration, employee onboarding, pay schedule setup, direct deposit, and registration with state agencies. Final setup cost depends on factors like number of states, number of employees, state requirements, prior payroll history, and any needed cleanup.
payrollPage.monthlyDesc: Your monthly fee is based on the structure and complexity of your payroll. Pricing may vary depending on:
payrollPage.closure: Each quote is tailored to your situation, so you always know exactly what to expect. Let us take payroll off your plate with accuracy and care.

form1099Page.title: 1099 Preparation & Filing
form1099Page.subtitle: Compliance made simple for your contractors.
form1099Page.intro: We provide fast, accurate 1099 filing for your contractors, including preparation, IRS submission, and recipient copies. Ensure you meet all deadlines and avoid potential penalties with our streamlined service.
form1099Page.text1: Even a single missing or incorrect contractor form can lead to IRS notices and penalties. We review payments, verify contractor details, prepare all required forms, and file electronically with the IRS ensuring full compliance and timely delivery.
form1099Page.text2: Perfect for business owners who want to eliminate paperwork stress and protect their business from avoidable fines.

cards.dataDesc: Verify names, TINs, addresses, and payment totals for accuracy.
cards.prepDesc: Prepare correct forms for each contractor and payment type.
cards.efileDesc: Submit electronically to the IRS to meet deadlines and reduce errors.
cards.copiesDesc: Deliver official copies to contractors securely and on time.

hiw.step1Desc: Collect contractor details and verify payment records.
hiw.step2Desc: Generate accurate forms based on validated information.
hiw.step3Desc: E‑file with the IRS and track submission status.
hiw.step4Desc: Provide recipients with official copies and confirmations.

salesTaxPage.title: Sales Tax
salesTaxPage.subtitle: Accurate multi-state sales tax compliance.
salesTaxPage.intro1: Accurate multi-state sales tax calculation, filing, and compliance.
salesTaxPage.intro2: We help ensure you’re charging, tracking, and remitting sales tax correctly, no matter how complex your sales channels are.
salesTaxPage.text1: Sales tax rules can vary not only by state but by county, product type, and sales channel. We help you understand where your obligations begin, how to stay compliant with nexus requirements, and how to set up systems that ensure accurate collection and reporting.
salesTaxPage.text2: Whether you operate locally in Florida or sell nationwide online we simplify compliance and reduce risk.

cards.nexusDesc: Identify where you have sales tax obligations and avoid missed filings.
cards.integrationDesc: Align marketplaces, POS, and e-commerce platforms for accurate collection.
cards.filingDesc: Prepare, file, and remit in every jurisdiction on time, every time.
cards.auditDesc: Maintain records and reports that withstand state scrutiny.

hiw.step1Desc: Review operations and determine nexus and requirements.
hiw.step2Desc: Set up systems for accurate collection and tracking.
hiw.step3Desc: Apply correct rates and rules across channels and states.
hiw.step4Desc: Prepare filings and remit payments before deadlines.

newBusinessPage.title: New Business Entity Formation
newBusinessPage.subtitle: Start your business on the right foundation.
newBusinessPage.intro: We help you choose the right structure, file the required documents, and set up your business properly from day one.
newBusinessPage.text1: The structure you choose on day one affects your taxes, liability, paperwork, and future business options. We guide you step-by-step: selecting the right entity type, filing required documents, registering properly with Florida and other states agencies, and completing IRS elections such as S-Corp status if needed.
newBusinessPage.text2: With a strong foundation, you avoid costly restructuring later, and start your business with confidence, clarity, and tax efficiency.

cards.entityDesc: LLC, S-Corp, C-Corp, or sole proprietor—choose what fits your goals.
cards.einDesc: Obtain EIN and complete state registrations accurately and quickly.
cards.irsDesc: Evaluate and file elections such as S-Corp when beneficial.
cards.booksDesc: Implement accounting systems and chart of accounts from day one.

hiw.step1Desc: Understand your goals, risks, and operational needs.
hiw.step2Desc: Prepare and file formation documents and registrations.
hiw.step3Desc: Analyze and submit IRS elections where advantageous.
hiw.step4Desc: Configure bookkeeping and reporting for ongoing compliance.

businessTaxPage.title: Business Tax Preparation
businessTaxPage.subtitle: Hands-on, detail-driven business tax preparation for corporations, partnerships, and self-employed individuals.
businessTaxPage.intro: We offer hands-on, detail-driven business tax preparation for corporations, partnerships, and self-employed, giving you the support of a trusted professional.
businessTaxPage.text1: Accurate business tax filing is essential for compliance and financial health. We handle Forms 1120, 1120-S, 1065, and Schedule C.
businessTaxPage.text2: We not only prepare your return but also analyze your financial statements to identify tax-saving opportunities.
businessTaxPage.text3: Proper classification of expenses and understanding of tax credits can significantly reduce your tax liability.
businessTaxPage.ctaSubtitle: Schedule a consultation with our experts today.

personalTaxPage.title: Personal Tax Preparation
personalTaxPage.subtitle: Accurate and compliant personal tax preparation services maximizing your refund and reducing your tax burden legally.
personalTaxPage.preparedWith: Every tax return is prepared with:
personalTaxPage.goalText: Our goal is to help you stay fully compliant while uncovering every opportunity to maximize your refund or reduce your tax burden legally. You'll always know exactly where you stand, and you'll never feel alone in the process.
personalTaxPage.ethicsText: At Precise Accounting, we follow the highest standards of professional ethics, confidentiality, and compliance required by the IRS, and U.S. Treasury Department. Your information is safe. Your rights are protected.
personalTaxPage.longText1: We handle all types of personal tax returns, from simple W-2 filings to complex situations involving investments, rental properties, and self-employment.
personalTaxPage.longText2: We carefully review your financial documents to ensure every deduction and credit you are entitled to is claimed.
personalTaxPage.longText3: Tax laws change frequently. We stay up-to-date with the latest regulations so you don't have to.
personalTaxPage.longText4: If you receive a notice from the IRS or state tax agency, we can help you understand it and respond appropriately.
personalTaxPage.longText5: We believe in building long-term relationships with our clients, providing year-round support and planning.
personalTaxPage.ctaSubtitle: Get your personal taxes done right.
personalTaxPage.estimateDisclaimer: *The estimate is an approximation. Final pricing depends on complexity.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.subtitle: We're here to help with your accounting needs.
contactPage.friendly: We are available via email, phone, and messaging apps.
contactPage.securityNote: Your information is secure and confidential.
